last_episode_to_air.name: Disintegration
last_episode_to_air.overview: A procedure puts Halan face-to-face with Aleph. Harmony protects the beacon by any means necessary.

name: Beacon 23
overview: Aster Calyx and Halan Kai Nielsen are inextricably drawn to Beacon 23. Navigating one threat after another, they unravel the beaconâ€™s mysteries, just in time to face their most powerful enemy.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: In Season Two, Beacon 23 is now little more than a prison with Aleph onboard, and The Artifact provides more questions than answers. Without a clear path forward, the inhabitants of Beacon 23 must rely on each other, but their conflicting agendas may get in the way.

tagline: No one escapes with their sanity.

episodes.name: Corbenic
episodes.overview: Beacon 23's secrets are exposed by an unexpected visitor.

episodes.name: Wreckers
episodes.overview: As Wreckers force their way onboard, Aster will have to put her trust in an enemy to survive.

episodes.name: Why Can't We Go On as Three?
episodes.overview: In shock after her first kill, Aster buries her feelings as she and Halan prepare for QTA Manager Coley to arrive on the beacon. Coley immediately distrusts Halan and sees him as a threat, forcing Aster to make a tough decision.

episodes.name: God in the Machine
episodes.overview: In the early days of Beacon 23's history, Sophie receives a surprise visit, forcing her AI to act.

episodes.name: Rocky
episodes.overview: While uncovering Halan's past, Aster finds a link to the rocks that will alter both their lives.

episodes.name: Beacon Twenty Three
episodes.overview: Going back in time to show how the rocks first appeared on Beacon 23.

episodes.name: End Transmission
episodes.overview: Aster and Halan become obsessed with learning more about The Artifact, when an organization known as The Column arrives at the beacon and reveals even more connections. The weight of this knowledge turns out to be too much for one of our heroes.

episodes.name: Adamantine
episodes.overview: The QTA Mothership descends on Beacon 23, and Aster must make a life-or-death decision.

episodes.name: Godspeed
episodes.overview: Returning to Beacon 23, the inhabitants are still trapped under Aleph's watchful eye.

episodes.name: Purgatory
episodes.overview: Trapped within AI headquarters, Harmony must find a way to break free and return to Beacon 23.

episodes.name: Iris
episodes.overview: Keeper of Beacon 67, Iris, goes to help Halan and they make a strange discovery.

episodes.name: Berth
episodes.overview: Iris tries to piece together what happened to the missing pilot, while harmony finds a rogue AI.

episodes.name: Song of Sorrow
episodes.overview: Emerging from the pocket universe, Dosto is strangely elusive about the whereabouts of his crew.

episodes.name: Luan Casca
episodes.overview: Beacon Keeper Jocko welcomes a new trainee, a teenage Aster. Aster exposes Jocko's dark secret.

episodes.name: Free
episodes.overview: Halan's past catches up to him when a military ship comes looking for the lost Sybarrans.

episodes.name: Disintegration
episodes.overview: A procedure puts Halan face-to-face with Aleph. Harmony protects the beacon by any means necessary.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: In Season Two, Beacon 23 is now little more than a prison with Aleph onboard, and The Artifact provides more questions than answers. Without a clear path forward, the inhabitants of Beacon 23 must rely on each other, but their conflicting agendas may get in the way.
